PHANTOM_ROD.name: Phantom Rod
PHANTOM_ROD.deformatted_lore: Damage: +200 Strength: +125  Ability: Phantom Impel LEFT CLICK Terrify hooked enemies pushing them away and dealing massive damage.  Increases fishing speed by 65%  This item can be reforged!  Requires Fishing Skill 21 LEGENDARY FISHING WEAPON

PICKONIMBUS.name: Pickonimbus 2000
PICKONIMBUS.deformatted_lore: Breaking Power 7  Damage: +30 Mining Speed: +1,500  A powerful tool that breaks after 5000 uses.  This item can be reforged! EPIC PICKAXE

PICNIC_SET.name: Picnic Set
lore: can be placed on your island or
PICNIC_SET.deformatted_lore: Furniture Summer Cosmetic  This exclusive Summer cosmetic can be placed on your island or traded.  RARE

PIGS_FOOT.name: Pig's Foot
lore: Like a Rabbit's Foot, but more
PIGS_FOOT.deformatted_lore: Speed: +1  Like a Rabbit's Foot, but more useless.  * Co-op Soulbound * RARE ACCESSORY

PIG_AXE.name: Pig Axe
PIG_AXE.deformatted_lore: Ability: Pig Specialist Killing a Pig increases its drops by 2x.  This item can be reforged! UNCOMMON AXE

PIG_GENERATOR_12.name: Pig Minion XII
lore: Place this minion and it will
Pigs! Minions also work when you
PIG_GENERATOR_12.deformatted_lore: Place this minion and it will start generating and slaying Pigs! Minions also work when you are offline!  Time Between Actions: 10s Max Storage: 960

PIG_MASK.name: Pig Mask
lore: Wear this mask to show your
PIG_MASK.deformatted_lore: Speed: +1  Wear this mask to show your support for the Dante resistance.  Cosmetic item!  This item can be reforged! LEGENDARY HELMET

PILE_OF_CASH.name: Giant pile of Cash
lore: Wear this mask to show your
PILE_OF_CASH.deformatted_lore: Speed: +1  Wear this mask to show your support for the Dante resistance.  Cosmetic item!  This item can be reforged! LEGENDARY HELMET

PINK_BUNNY_PERSONALITY.name: Pink Bunny Minion Skin
PINK_BUNNY_PERSONALITY.deformatted_lore: This Minion skin changes your minion's appearance to a Pink Bunny.  You can place this item in any minion of your choice!  COMMON COSMETIC

PINK_DONUT_PERSONALITY.name: Pink Donut Minion Skin
PINK_DONUT_PERSONALITY.deformatted_lore: This Minion skin changes your minion's appearance to a Pink Frosted Donut.  You can place this item in any minion of your choice!  COMMON COSMETIC

PINK_GREATER_BACKPACK.name: Greater Backpack
PINK_GREATER_BACKPACK.deformatted_lore: This Minion skin changes your minion's appearance to a Pink Frosted Donut.  You can place this item in any minion of your choice!  COMMON COSMETIC

PINK_LARGE_BACKPACK.name: Large Backpack
PINK_LARGE_BACKPACK.deformatted_lore: This Minion skin changes your minion's appearance to a Pink Frosted Donut.  You can place this item in any minion of your choice!  COMMON COSMETIC

PINK_MEDIUM_BACKPACK.name: Medium Backpack
PINK_MEDIUM_BACKPACK.deformatted_lore: This Minion skin changes your minion's appearance to a Pink Frosted Donut.  You can place this item in any minion of your choice!  COMMON COSMETIC

PINK_SMALL_BACKPACK.name: Small Backpack
PINK_SMALL_BACKPACK.deformatted_lore: This Minion skin changes your minion's appearance to a Pink Frosted Donut.  You can place this item in any minion of your choice!  COMMON COSMETIC

PLASMA.name: Plasma
PLASMA.deformatted_lore: Stable magnetic field, but to handle with caution.  RARE

PLASMA_BUCKET.name: Plasma Bucket
PLASMA_BUCKET.deformatted_lore: Increases the speed of your minion by 35%. Unlimited Duration!  MYTHIC

PLASMA_NUCLEUS.name: Plasma Nucleus
PLASMA_NUCLEUS.deformatted_lore: Combine with an Overflux Power Orb to increase its strength and create a Plasmaflux Power Orb.  Right-click to view recipes!  LEGENDARY

PLUMBER_SPONGE.name: Plumber's Sponge
PLUMBER_SPONGE.deformatted_lore: Instructions:  1. Place on water.  2. Drains other water.  3. Double-bill client.  Thanks Plumber Joe!  New! Also works with lava!  UNCOMMON

POCKET_ESPRESSO_MACHINE.name: Pocket Espresso Machine
POCKET_ESPRESSO_MACHINE.deformatted_lore: Costs 1 Soulflow per 5s in combat:  Gain +100 Intelligence  Enabled: On Right-click to toggle!   Requires Enderman Slayer 4 COMMON ACCESSORY

POTATO_BASKET.name: Basket of Hope from the Great Potato War
lore: - Sun Tzu, The Art of War
POTATO_BASKET.deformatted_lore: Leaderboard Position: #169 Awarded to: IRONM00N  The greatest victory is that which requires no battle. - Sun Tzu, The Art of War  EPIC

POTATO_CROWN.name: Potato Crown
lore: winner of the Great Potato War.
All men can see the tactics
whereby I conquer, but what none
can see is the strategy out
- Sun Tzu, The Art of War
POTATO_CROWN.deformatted_lore: Speed: +1  Ability: Potato King Bestowed by Hypixel to the winner of the Great Potato War.  All men can see the tactics whereby I conquer, but what none can see is the strategy out  which victory is evolved. - Sun Tzu, The Art of War  This item can be reforged! LEGENDARY HELMET

POTATO_GENERATOR_12.name: Potato Minion XII
lore: Place this minion and it will
POTATO_GENERATOR_12.deformatted_lore: Place this minion and it will start generating and harvesting potatoes. Requires dirt or soil nearby so potatoes can be planted. Minions also work when you are offline!  Time Between Actions: 8s Max Storage: 960

POTATO_SPREADING.name: Potato Spreading
lore: This item can be used as a
minion upgrade. Place it in ONE
POTATO_SPREADING.deformatted_lore: This item can be used as a minion upgrade. Place it in ONE minion and it will occasionally generate Potatoes!  EPIC

POTATO_TALISMAN.name: Potato Talisman
POTATO_TALISMAN.deformatted_lore: Speed: +1  Your potato minions farm 5% faster while wearing on your island.  Forged by the Potato King after winning the Great Potato War.  COMMON ACCESSORY

POWER_CRYSTAL.name: Power Crystal
lore: Can be obtained through refining at forges
Has a single use and can be stacked.
POWER_CRYSTAL.deformatted_lore: Powers Beacons for up to 48 hours at a time!  Can be obtained through refining at forges in the Dwarven Mines.  Has a single use and can be stacked.  EPIC  Items Required Starfall x256  Duration: 2h

PRECIOUS_PEARL.name: Precious Pearl
lore: Combine 9x of this stone at the
PRECIOUS_PEARL.deformatted_lore: Power Stone  Combine 9x of this stone at the Thaumaturgist to permanently unlock the Pleasant power.  At mmm Magical Power: +mmm Health +mmm Defense  Requires Combat Skill Level XXV!  EPIC POWER STONE

PRECURSOR_EYE.name: Precursor Eye
lore: Fire a laser in front of you
PRECURSOR_EYE.deformatted_lore: Gear Score: 877  Health: +222 Defense: +222  Intelligence: +222   [] []  Ability: Eye Beam SNEAK Fire a laser in front of you dealing 4000 damage and costing 40 mana. The damage increases by 100% every second for 5 seconds and the mana cost increases by 25% every second. You can sneak again to de-activate the laser.  Mana is consumed on damage. SUMMONING_RING.deformatted_lore: Ability: Raise Souls RIGHT CLICK Monsters you kill while you have this item will drop their soul. creatures that you spawn to be

lore: The head of Matchos is a
MATCH_STICKS.deformatted_lore: Consume to light yourself on fire for 10 seconds granting you +10 Strength. The head of Matchos is a combination of Sulphur and a crystalline substance. With even the slightest frictions they will light up.  RARE

MAWDUST_DAGGER.name: Twilight Dagger
MAWDUST_DAGGER.deformatted_lore: Damage: +90 Strength: +45 Crit Damage: +15%  Ability: Attunement RIGHT CLICK Swap between Spirit and Crystal mode in order to attack through Hellion Shields.  Attuned: Spirit  Deal 1.5x damage to Blazes. Deal 1.2x damage to Skeletons.  Ability: Wraith Drain On hit, heal for 200 + 4% after 6s if the Hellion Shield has switched attunement.  This item can be reforged!  Requires Blaze Slayer 2. RARE SWORD

REAPER_SCYTHE.deformatted_lore: Damage: +333 Speed: +10  Ability: Raise Souls RIGHT CLICK Monsters you kill using this item will drop their soul. You can click on their souls on the ground using this item to absorb them and then spawn them to fight by your side.  Mana cost is based on the power of the monsters that you summon. Shift right-click to view and remove souls from this item. If your summoned monster dies the soul will be removed. Cooldown: 1s  Max Souls: 3  This item can be reforged!  Requires Zombie Slayer 7 LEGENDARY SWORD

SIMPLE_CARROT_CANDY.deformatted_lore: Feeding carrot candy to your pets gives them a boost of exp but pets can only eat 10 candy in their life time so choose your candy wisely!  Grants 20,000 pet exp  Right click on your pet to feed it this candy!  UNCOMMON

Placing it in a minion will
SOULFLOW_ENGINE.deformatted_lore: This item can be used as a minion upgrade.  Placing it in a minion will reduce the minion's output by 50%, but it will start generating Soulflow items.  While equipped on a Voidling minion, output is increased by 3% per minion level.   Requires Enderman Slayer 5 EPIC

lore: Your arrows mark enemies you hit
you, once the mark expires the
target will receive a burst of
damage equal to all the damage
